title: Sold! N284 Buchner BLONDIE PURCELL Orioles SGC
author: Jay Wolt

posts.post_title: Sold! N284 Buchner BLONDIE PURCELL Orioles SGC
posts.post_content:
1887 Buchner Gold Coin Blondie Purcell Baltimore Orioles, American assoc. SGC-10 SOLD.

In the N284 Buchner set there are 4 different Baltimore players.
Blondie Purcell played from 1879 to 1890. Seven years in the National League & 6 In the American association.

SGC has graded 4 Purcells, an Authentic, this 10, a 55 & a 60.
I upgraded this 10 to a 55, so I have 2 of the 4 SGC's.
PSA has graded just one, a PSA-3 that's currently on eBay for $499.99.

If interested PM or Email me at [URL="jaycos@qualitycards.com"]jaycos@qualitycards.com[/URL]

[IMG]http://www.qualitycards.com/pictures/1233772147.jpg[/IMG]

[IMG]http://www.qualitycards.com/pictures/1233772147b.jpg[/IMG]

Jay - Happy New Year to you and the family.
Good Luck with this sale.
I love this set!
RayB

Ray, Hope all is well in frosty Maine, Have a great New Year!

Regarding the Buchner, final reduction SOLD dlvd
